com.sdicons.json.repository

Interface ClassHelper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassMapper, ClassSerializer, ComplexClassMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapper, AbstractSerializer, ArrayMapper, ArraySerializer, BigDecimalMapper, BigDecimalSerializer, BigIntegerMapper, BigIntegerSerializer, BooleanMapper, BooleanSerializer, ByteMapper, ByteSerializer, CharacterMapper, CharacterSerializer, CollectionMapper, CollectionSerializer, ColorSerializer, DateMapper, DateSerializer, DoubleMapper, DoubleSerializer, EnumMapper, EnumSerializer, FloatMapper, FloatSerializer, FontSerializer, IntegerMapper, IntegerSerializer, LongMapper, LongSerializer, MapMapper, MapSerializer, ObjectMapperFields, ObjectMapperMeta, ObjectMapperProps, ObjectSerializerFields, ObjectSerializerMeta, ObjectSerializerProps, ShortMapper, ShortSerializer, StringMapper, StringSerializer

    public interface ClassHelper
    It represents some kind of functionality that is associated with a class. An example could be a converter or something similar. The idea is that when you have an instance you can apply the correct functionality on that instance using the class.
